text:
Apple has launched the new M4 MacBook Air with a new sky blue color, now starting at $999

You can order today and will be available on March 12
Need that
Sky Blue, one of the best colors ever
You know, that color is actually quite nice

New MacBook Air with M4 chip key features:

•  M4 chip with 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU for up to 2x faster performance than M1 models

•  New sky blue color option joining midnight, starlight, and silver

•  Lower starting price of $999 ($100 less than before)

•  16GB RAM
That’s a cool color…..  can’t imagine the average user will see much a difference between M3 and M4.
Wow! This looks so cool
Starting RAM size?
It’s a great offer.
Is there really anything new about it other than enhancements? New chip, new color, and built for “Apple Intelligence”, is that it?
Tim Cook really dropped a new color and made everyone forget about the M4 chip.
Sky blue is looking sleek.
Do you recommend the 13-inch or the 15-inch model and why?
oh i need it
Looks silver to me
it’s kinda ended the midnight colour hold awn-

Mahn that sky blue is soo sleek.
Missed out on this
Cleaaan
what a beauty
The sky blue colour is quite nice I am not going to lie

As a non-Apple user, I’m curious—can you still run Windows via Boot Camp or any alternative, or has Apple fully phased it out? 

If so, how well does it perform? Also, can the new M3 chips handle high-end gaming, or is that still a limitation?
So is like I want an iPhone or a MacBook. Mmmm
Nothing special about it
Looking pretty nice
I need 7pcs
Apple not fuckin off
Love the color hate the price. Get an m2 instead for half this
@AskPerplexity how much is it in india

It is a very interesting choice for Apple to go with another muted blue color.

I guess that's their thing with the Air line.
@AskPerplexity  How many monitors does it support?
Nice
looks promising.
Apple dropping prices? That’s rare! Now let’s see if the base model actually ships with decent storage.
Nothing new here. And @tim_cook is publishing this a world first new designed macbook. Such a shit.
Sky blue M4 MacBook Air at $999...Apple’s making it tempting to upgrade, but is 256GB still enough storage in 2025???
256 kinda sucks but overall this is actually pretty good considering they even took off $100
I see no blue
I wont buy a Macbook Air until apple makes it 14 inch
I WANT IT OMG
always dying with the macbook ports
Yay
PATHETIC
$1700 in Australia for the 13 inch is crazyy
One trick pony

Come on
The sky blue M4 MacBook Air is a sleek upgrade. Can't wait to see how it performs in real life!
looks very
Might need to upgrade from m2

i was about to SAY i’m like no way all we get is a new iPad

Damn, was hoping they'd drop a space black one

Price reduction was unexpected, I was actually expecting them to increase it since they added more RAM. 16 gigglebytes is plenty

MacBook Air base models are good value but the ram & especially storage upgrades still have ridiculous pricing. $200 just to upgrade to 512gb which is still tiny, $800 to upgrade to just 2tb!  Meanwhile you can buy a 4tb m.2 drive on amazon for just over $200
Love this new blue color, sad that they killed space gray tho
Omggg

The new sky blue color would be much more beautiful in real life!
